data.message: When people think of Facebook, they just think of a social media site. When i look at this, it shows me much more. You're changing the world Facebook. Connecting more people than ever.

replies.message: Thanks for sharing those kind words, Robert. Cheers to staying connected on Facebook! -Jordan
For real,  I come on here to connect to people,  Someone out there is always lonely,  or just mixed up....and need of advice...

How can you keep the bad guys in the mountains from having access? I don't ask this sarcastically, I would really like to know. I'm so grateful for this service and proud of our American inventors and entrepreneurs.

Diana Waters-Fraley what do you mean bad guys? Since Facebook is the Internet provider and the Internet is free, you can't stop them from accessing, however, face can look at what you're a searching up and could release that information to the proper authorities if illegal things are happening.
Congratulations Facebook
I dont understand y u so geared up. When i see fb i see it as a social media.  What else you fb as?
More like Zuckerberg trying to take over the world....
Anil Kumar think of the opportunities for everyone in the world. Global scale Internet when half of the population doesn't have it. This is amazing.
It's about the bigger picture ... But I forgot people like to walk around with rose colored glasses on.. And I was just simply stating a fact anyway!!!
This is just a spy/surveillance plane masquerading as a "Facebook plane"... Don't be sheep!  Be Sheppards! Hahaha
Robert Farias,,, why is my first post not showing,, is it because it tells the truth?
Tiffany Bowen what are you talking about. I didn't even know you replied
Tiffany Bowen, Marky Mark probably instructed his underlings to delete your comment.
Robert Farias, I just noticed that you were commenting on almost everybody's questions that were posted and you were calling them out by there names..
Tiffany Bowen I mean yea, im replying to peoples comments. Thats how you reply. But you said something about me deleting your first post.

Robert Farias I know that's how you reply but you are only commenting on someones post if it was opposing to the project or not praising it.. Oh and go back and read what I wrote because I never said you deleated my post, I said why is my first post not showing...

Tiffany Bowen yea because why would i talk to someone who agrees with what i agree with. not how a debate works. And its not showing because it  got deleted. Not hard to figure out. You replied to me as if blaming me that your comment is not showing. Dont reply to me if youre not talking to me or talking about things i actually did. comeon now, commenting 101
How will it stay up in the air in remote countries? This is amazing  to me!
Amazing!

I've connected with so many old friend because of FB and I've made new friends through other friends. Being an animal lover I can't even tell you how FB has made it possible to  find thousands of missing pets. I see it daily because of people sharing a missing flyer or pics. It just can reach so many people. I love Facebook!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Robert Farias 
Thank you for sharing.soo interesting
Awesome!
Smart minds,
What?
